summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) interview waiver form, used to document that an employee is voluntarily providing information as part of an OIG investigation. The form includes warnings, assurances, and signature blocks for the employee and OIG agents. The specific subject of the investigation is not clearly stated in the provided text.

persons.name: Tsorn Dgric
persons.context: Appears as the name of an Office of the Inspector General Special Agent on the interview waiver form.

keyFacts: The document is an OIG Form 111-226/2, a non-custodial/employee interview waiver form dated 05/03/21.
It confirms an Office of the Inspector General investigation is being conducted, and an employee is being asked to provide information voluntarily.
The employee is warned that their statement may be used in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The specific subject of the OIG investigation is not clearly legible in the provided text snippet.
